alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 4:18PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and sleet precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph across the higher elevations. * WHERE..Northwestern Connecticut, eastern Greene, Columbia, western Ulster and eastern Dutchess Counties in eastern New York. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow and ice covered roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A initial period of snow tonight will mix with and then change over to sleet overnight. Some rain may also mix in towards Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
